name: mailpoet-email-editor-demo
description: An example Demo of how to use the MailPoet Email Editor.
author: MailPoet

scripts.preinstall: npm run patch-files && cd packages/js/email-editor && npm install --frozen-lockfile --prefer-offline && cd ../../php/email-editor && composer install
scripts.build: cd packages/js/email-editor && npm run build && cp -Rf build ../../..
scripts.patch-files: npm run patch:composer-json && npm run patch:email-editor-php-files
